title: Identify market structure, profit-max Q from graph

content.question: The graph above shows the total revenue and total cost curves for a firm in which type of market structure and what is the profit-maximizing quantity?

choices.label:
Market Structure
 Quantity

Perfect Competition
 Q1

Market Structure
 Quantity

Perfect Competition
 Q3

Market Structure
 Quantity

Perfect Competition
 Q4

content.answer:
Market Structure
 Quantity

Perfect Competition
 Q3

unit.text: 3: Production, Cost, and the Perfect Competition Model

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
